Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface BaseVariantOutput

  • A Build variant output and all its public data. This is the base class for items common to apps, test apps, and libraries

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        org.gradle.api.Task getAssemble()
        Returns the assemble task for this particular output
        java.lang.String getBaseName()
        Returns the base name for the output of the variant.
        java.lang.String getDirName()
        Returns a subfolder name for the variant output.
        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the variant.
        java.io.File getOutputFile()
        Returns the output file for this build variants.
        ManifestProcessorTask getProcessManifest()
        Returns the Manifest processing task.
        ProcessAndroidResources getProcessResources()
        Returns the Android Resources processing task.
        void setOutputFile(java.io.File outputFile)

    • Inherited Methods Summary

        Inherited Methods 
        Methods inherited from class Name
        interface com.android.build.VariantOutput com.android.build.VariantOutput#getOutputs(), com.android.build.VariantOutput#getVersionCode(), com.android.build.VariantOutput#getMainOutputFile(), com.android.build.VariantOutput#getSplitFolder()
        class java.lang.Object java.lang.Object#wait(), java.lang.Object#wait(long), java.lang.Object#wait(long, int), java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object), java.lang.Object#toString(), java.lang.Object#hashCode(), java.lang.Object#getClass(), java.lang.Object#notify(), java.lang.Object#notifyAll()

    • Method Detail

      • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public org.gradle.api.Task getAssemble()

        Returns the assemble task for this particular output

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public java.lang.String getBaseName()

        Returns the base name for the output of the variant. Guaranteed to be unique.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public java.lang.String getDirName()

        Returns a subfolder name for the variant output. Guaranteed to be unique. This is usually a mix of build type and flavor(s) (if applicable). For instance this could be: "debug" "debug/myflavor" "release/Flavor1Flavor2"

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public java.lang.String getName()

        Returns the name of the variant. Guaranteed to be unique.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public java.io.File getOutputFile()

        Returns the output file for this build variants. Depending on the configuration, this could be an apk (regular and test project) or a bundled library (library project). If it's an apk, it could be signed, or not; zip-aligned, or not.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public ManifestProcessorTask getProcessManifest()

        Returns the Manifest processing task.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public ProcessAndroidResources getProcessResources()

        Returns the Android Resources processing task.

      • public void setOutputFile(@com.android.annotations.NonNull java.io.File outputFile)
